title: Can't click part of screen
body: So in the bottom right hand corner area i cant click inside the client.  It just acts as if the mouse is going right through it.  In game, if i go to use the minimap, it takes me out of the game and brings me to the desktop.  Its quite annoying and it just started happening and i can't find anything online about it

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be a background program causing this weird interaction to happen. I strongly recommend [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no programs are trying to draw over the client.

Let me know if that resolved the issue.
